meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 23, 2024, Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Submitted Amendments Recommended for Exclusion
agenda_items.description: Amendments 71, 100, and 112 are recommended for exclusion.

agenda_items.title: Prohibit the creation of jobs exempt from Civil Service
agenda_items.description: Amendment 15 to prohibit the creation of jobs exempt from Civil Service in Chapter XVI.

agenda_items.title: Clarify city council's role in designating managerial personnel
agenda_items.description: Amendments 90 and 107 to clarify that the city council designates which managerial personnel are included within the unclassified service.

agenda_items.title: Amend Chapter XVI §6 regarding reorganizations and reductions in force
agenda_items.description: Amendment 91 to reflect that reorganizations and reductions in force should be treated in the same manner with respect to compensation and reassignment.

agenda_items.title: Clarify the duty of the Human Resources Department
agenda_items.description: Amendment 106 to clarify that it is the duty of the Human Resources Department to establish rules governing the evaluation of conduct and performance.

agenda_items.title: Add requirement for a citywide Bike Plan
agenda_items.description: Amendment 117 to add a requirement for the city to adopt a citywide Bike Plan by ordinance.

agenda_items.title: Authorize administrative approval of plat applications
agenda_items.description: Amendments 99 and 116 to authorize administrative approval of plat applications.

agenda_items.title: Broaden the city’s notification process
agenda_items.description: Amendments 110, 118, 119, and 120 to broaden the city’s notification process to include other media options.

agenda_items.title: Amend special meeting call requirements
agenda_items.description: Amendment 123 to require that special meetings shall be called upon the written request of five members of the city council.

agenda_items.title: Extend deadline for petitioners to collect signatures
agenda_items.description: Amendments 55 and 114 to extend the deadline for petitioners to collect required signatures from 60 days to 120 days.

agenda_items.title: Reduce number of signatures required for referendum
agenda_items.description: Amendments 55 and 115 to reduce the number of signatures required on a petition in support of holding a referendum.

agenda_items.title: Amend vote requirement for council to amend redistricting plan
agenda_items.description: Amendment 93 to amend the vote requirement for council to amend the redistricting commission’s recommended districting plan.

agenda_items.title: Allow residents to serve on various commissions
agenda_items.description: Amendment 94 to allow residents to serve on the redistricting commission, the plan commission, the civil service board, and the park and recreation board.

agenda_items.title: Delete section on urban conservation programs
agenda_items.description: Amendment 86 to delete the section allowing the city council to provide urban conservation, rehabilitation, and redevelopment programs.

agenda_items.title: Amend language regarding City Secretary's assistants
agenda_items.description: Amendment 58 to amend language to provide the City Secretary with assistants and employees.

agenda_items.title: Amend requirement for assistant city attorneys
agenda_items.description: Amendment 56 to delete or amend the requirement that all assistant city attorneys shall devote their entire time to the service of the city.
